suggest.joomla/database: Install joomla/database if you want to use Database session storage.
suggest.joomla/event: Install joomla/event to dispatch session events in Joomla\Session\Session.
suggest.joomla/filesystem: Install joomla/filesystem if you want to use file based session storage.
suggest.joomla/input: The joomla/input package is required to use Joomla\Session\Session.
suggest.paragonie/random_compat: The paragonie/random_compat package is required to use Joomla\Session\Session on PHP 5.x.
